page.title: 11INTERVIEWING THE RECTOR
page.content: We interviewed the{Rector}and found out these interesting things about his job. Our Rector became Rector of{Orsett}& {Bulphan}in{1977}and he enjoys it very much. Although there is a{crypt}under the church he has never been down to see it. He told us that there are about{fifty graves}in the graveyard. The{largest}number of people he can remember being at a service is{a {hundred}and the{least}number is {twelve. { }He has visited lots of schools during his career. When he was a missionary in Africa he was in charge of{twenty-one}schools. The longest service he has held is about three hours, and the shortest about twenty minutes. He has{christened}about{1000 {children}and{30 adults.}He told us that he is also the{Hospital Chaplain.
